caption: Table 1: The performance of LI-DiT on T2I-CompBench, DPG-Bench and GenEval benchmark. We compare LI-DiT-1B with recent open-source academic works and compare LI-DiT-10B with mainstream closed-source commercial models. Experiments indicate the superior capabilities of LI-DiT on complex prompt understanding across the model size.
description: This table presents a quantitative comparison of the LI-DiT model's performance against other state-of-the-art text-to-image generation models on three benchmark datasets: T2I-CompBench, DPG-Bench, and GenEval.  The results demonstrate LI-DiT's superior performance across different model sizes (1B and 10B parameters), showcasing its ability to handle complex prompts and achieve high image quality. The comparison includes both open-source and closed-source commercial models to illustrate LI-DiT's overall competitiveness.

caption: Table 1: The performance of LI-DiT on T2I-CompBench, DPG-Bench and GenEval benchmark. We compare LI-DiT-1B with recent open-source academic works and compare LI-DiT-10B with mainstream closed-source commercial models. Experiments indicate the superior capabilities of LI-DiT on complex prompt understanding across the model size.
description: This table presents a comparison of the LI-DiT model's performance against other state-of-the-art models on three different benchmarks: T2I-CompBench, DPG-Bench, and GenEval.  It shows the LI-DiT model's superior performance across different model sizes (1B and 10B parameters), highlighting its ability to understand complex prompts better than other models.
